channel.title: Donator Shop?
channel.description: If someone could like start me off on how to add one and mabey give me a little help on how to make it so donators only can trade somthing like they can only trade it if donator = 1 in their profile cause there is a spot in each profile that says donator = 0

item.title: Donator Shop?
item.dc:creator: @Imnotokkk Imnotokkk
item.description:
@Imnotokkk wrote:

[quote=“da pimp, post:2, topic:256186”]search for

public void process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms

below that, add

if((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == #####) || (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 746) { remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], playerWeapon); sendMessage("You need to be staff to equip this item."); } }[/quote]
im not looking to make an item only wearable by staff i want a shop that only people who have donator = 1 in their profile can trade it.

Read full topic

item.title: Donator Shop?
item.dc:creator: @da_pimp da pimp
item.description:
@da_pimp wrote:

search for

public void process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms

below that, add

if((playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == #####) || (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 746) { remove(playerEquipment[playerWeapon], playerWeapon); sendMessage("You need to be staff to equip this item."); } }
